snippet.title: Arid Arnold Launch Trailer - Free Download
snippet.description:
Arid Arnold is a classic adventure, explore 9 unique worlds, travel in time, talk to racoons, go to hell and back in search of the fountain of water. 

Oh no! The local steam plant is almost out of water, they risk shutting down if they don't find more. Luckily, great-witch Barbara is in town and she was able to summon a man by the name of Arnold in hopes that he may find some water. Play as Arnold explore 9 worlds and find the mythic fountain of water in this puzzling-platforming-bonanza.

FREE DOWNLOAD: Search for "Arid Arnold" on itch.io (Not allowed to put links here apparently?)

Twitter: @icefishsoftware
